Moss Side CoderDojo @ Powerhouse Library

This is the site for PowerhouseCoders, the Moss Side CoderDojo at Powerhouse Library, new for October 2021! There will be more here on the website soon, but in the meantime you can read about CoderDojo here, follow us on social media or sign up for our newsletter.

Our next sessions will be Saturday 13th November and Saturday 11th December 2021, 2pm - 4pm.

Sign up to our mailing list (on the left) for news when tickets are released!
